77.59.text:

99.48.text:

133.24.text:
the biggest and heaviest

137.67.text:
It's a good amount of weight,

140.13.text:
But let's start where

145.25.text:
I grew up in Switzerland as a very

and also lacking in willpower,

why I lost my first apprenticeship

I didn't even recognize it

197.37.text: So a few months later, I got diagnosed -

202.03.text:
my back started to hurt very bad,

208.48.text: So scoliosis is a medical condition

210.70.text:
in which a person's spine
has a sideways curve.

215.31.text: The most common symptoms for scoliosis

217.44.text:
are a limited mobility,
and pain in the shoulder, back, and neck.

226.18.text: at the screening for the Swiss Army

229.26.text:
the cardiologist couldn't even

233.22.text:
because my spine was twisted so bad

239.60.text:
And this started to worry me
about my future,

248.76.text:
the doctors were adamant

252.49.text:
but after a few weeks

256.44.text:
Time went by,
and my back issues got worse.

263.10.text:
that there is a magic pill

Now that didn't sound

379.90.text:
And it's also the reason

Another even more important reason

that a bad body posture

I see so many young,

463.38.text:

480.53.text:
also, helps people

are the reason

544.15.text: And, it can help you as well.

550.62.text: it builds up slowly but constantly.

558.98.text:
because knowing about

566.83.text:
People still struggle

670.83.text:
that as soon as you overreach

that's what you hear

how people think it is,

734.36.text:
So, should everybody in this room now

should strive to become

And natural bodybuilding

759.68.text:
Look at the bigger picture,
